Plot: I like Joan of Arc best of all my books; and it is the best; I know it perfectly well. And besides, it furnished me seven times the pleasure afforded me by any of the others; twelve years of preparation, and two years of writing. The others needed no preparation and got none. --Mark Twain
Characters: Yolande of Aragon, Jean de Dunois, Robert de Baudricourt, Étienne de Vignolles, Joan of Arc, Charles VII of France, Noel Rainguesson
Setting: France, Domrémy (France), Vaucouleurs (France), Chinon , 1429 (France) Poitiers , 1429 (France) Orléans , 1429 (France) Kingdom of France, Chinon (France), Poitiers (France), Orléans (France), Kingdom of France
